Energizer Holdings is an American manufacturer of batteries and personal care products, headquartered in Town and Country, Missouri.

U.S. Census Bureau. Retrieved on August 18, 2009.Volkmann, Kelsey. "[http://stlouis.bizjournals.com/stlouis/stories/2009/07/27/daily21.html Energizer to cut jobs as sales slump]." [[St. Louis Business Journal]]. Tuesday July 28, 2009. Retrieved on August 18, 2009. Its most well known brands are Energizer and [[Eveready Battery Company|Eveready]] batteries, [[Schick (razors)|Schick]], [[Wilkinson Sword]] and [[Edge (shaving gel)|Edge]] shaving products, [[Playtex]] feminine hygiene and baby products, and [[Hawaiian Tropic]] and Banana Boat sunscreen products. The company sells in over 165 countries.2006 Annual Report, pg. 5
